name: Unbound (Sebastian Sangervasi)
description:
Unbound
 Make up the controls as you play

Start each level with no keys bound.

Step on "binders" to gain a sense of direction... until you run out of memory. 

Find your way out

These disembodied voices are hiding something from 
you: the exit!

Also their private thoughts and feelings. But mostly the exit. 

Test your logic and your memory

The challenge increases.

Will you need help?

Also, poetry.
Verses written and hidden.
Collectables. Duh.

A game by Sebastian Sangervasi
Original soundtrack by jaVus
